lead_paragraph: A United Nations helicopter with seven people on board crashed into the sea today off Sierra Leone, a spokesman for the organization said. Three bodies were recovered. There were no reports of survivors. The copter crashed near where a large United Nations force is disarming rebel groups after a brutal 10-year civil war, the spokesman, Farhan Haq, said from New York.
abstract: United Nations helicopter with seven people on board crashes into sea off Sierra Leone, near site where UN force is disarming rebel groups; three bodies are recovered (S)
